dataTypeSection.title: What data, insights, reports, or expertise have you locked away?
dataTypeSection.description: Knoldg is your platform to showcase and monetize your intellectual assets. The platform organizes all your published material—including data and insights by category, making it easy for global audiences to find and purchase your work.

insighter.title: What is an
insighter.point1: A subject matter expert, practitioner, consultant, strategist, technician, or field professional with hands-on experience,
insighter.point2: who shares valuable data, reports, insights, case studies, or practical tools on Knoldg platform to empower others and help businesses grow;
insighter.point3: A knowledge contributor who earns income each time their expertise is accessed.

aboutUsPage.firstParagraph: Knoldg is a pioneering digital platform that provides individuals and businesses with access to high-quality business knowledge, such as data, reports, insights, and manuals across various industries. Our mission is to facilitate seamless knowledge sharing by offering a structured and accessible marketplace for expert-driven content.
aboutUsPage.firstParagraphPartTwo: Whether you're a professional seeking valuable knowledge or an industry expert looking to monetize your expertise, Knoldg is your gateway to trusted insights.
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart1: At Knoldg, we envision a world where expertise is easily accessible, enabling businesses and professionals to make informed decisions with confidence.
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart2: We aim to bridge the gap between knowledge seekers and knowledge creators
aboutUsPage.ourVisionPart3: , fostering a dynamic ecosystem of learning and growth.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer1P: – Users can browse and access a variety of knowledge types, including reports, data sets, insights, and manuals. Knowledge files are available for both personal and business use, with some being free and others available for purchase. Additionally, users can buy full reports or specific sections, such as individual chapters or particular datasets, on a pay-as-you-go basis.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer2P: – Users can connect directly with knowledge experts for additional insights related to a particular uploaded knowledge file. They can also book consultation sessions with experts for deeper discussions and personalized guidance.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer3P: – Knoldg features an advanced AI-supported search engine that enhances discoverability and accessibility of insights, making it easier for users to find relevant information. Our data is structured based on international standards such as ISIC and HS Codes, ensuring seamless integration into global business frameworks.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer4P: – Subject matter experts, consultants, and analysts can publish and sell their data, report and insights, earning revenue from their knowledge contributions.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer5P: – Experts on Knoldg can be individual professionals or companies. The platform supports company creation, allowing company owners to invite experts—both from within the platform and external professionals—to contribute knowledge, upload insights, and sell data and reports.
aboutUsPage.whatOffer6P: – Serving professionals and businesses worldwide, with a focus on the EU, GCC region, U.S., and Jordan.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp1: – Gain access to industry reports, market research, and expert analyses.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp2: – Share your expertise, grow your audience, and earn from your knowledge.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp3: – Distribute valuable insights to a wider professional audience.
aboutUsPage.benefitKnoldgp4: – Utilize expert insights for informed policymaking and economic development.
aboutUsPage.parentCompanyParagraph: Knoldg is proudly owned and operated by A&B Consulting, a firm dedicated to driving business success through strategic insights and sustainable solutions. With a strong foundation in consulting and research, A&B Consulting ensures that Knoldg remains a trusted and professional platform for knowledge exchange.

Resources.user-guide-description: Welcome to the KNOLDG User Guide. Here you'll find everything you need to know about using our platform.
Resources.user-guide-welcome-message: This guide will help you navigate through all the features and functionalities of KNOLDG platform.
Resources.user-guide-navigation-instruction: Use the sidebar navigation to find specific topics you're interested in.
Resources.user-guide-help-instruction: If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
Resources.getting-started-description: Learn the basics of using KNOLDG platform and start your journey.
Resources.create-account-step: Create an account or sign in to your existing account
Resources.complete-profile-step: Complete your profile with relevant information
Resources.explore-content-step: Start exploring content from the home page
Resources.save-content-step: Save interesting content for later reference
Resources.next-steps-description: After getting familiar with the basics, continue exploring:
Resources.account-management-next: Learn more about account management options
Resources.search-tips-next: Check out search tips to find exactly what you need

UserProfile.becomeInsighterDescription: Register as a knowledge provider and start uploading reports and data on the platform

termsAndConditions.welcomeKnoldg: Welcome to Knoldg, an online platform that provides access to expert insights, reports, and data. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please refrain from using Knoldg.
termsAndConditions.authorizedUsers: Authorized Users: Individuals or businesses that have registered and obtained access to Knoldg's services according to their account type.
termsAndConditions.expertContributors: Expert Contributors: Individuals or companies that upload reports, insights, or data for sale.
termsAndConditions.subscribersPurchasers: Subscribers & Purchasers: Users who buy or subscribe to reports and insights.
termsAndConditions.primaryUser: Knoldg has four primary user types:
termsAndConditions.freeUsers: Free Users: Can browse available content but have limited access to premium insights.
termsAndConditions.payYou: Pay-as-You-Go Users: Purchase individual reports or insights on demand.
termsAndConditions.subscribers: Subscribers: Access tiered subscription plans that provide broader access to reports and insights.
termsAndConditions.expertContributors2: Expert Contributors: Individuals who upload insights, reports, or data for sale.
termsAndConditions.UsersPurchaseReports: Users can purchase reports individually or subscribe to tiered access plans:
termsAndConditions.payYou2: Pay-as-you-go: One-time purchases of specific reports or insights.
termsAndConditions.subscription: Subscription Tiers: Monthly or annual plans with varying levels of access.
termsAndConditions.enterpriseLicensing: Enterprise Licensing: Custom solutions for businesses requiring multiple-user access.
termsAndConditions.purchasedreports: Purchased reports are for personal or internal business use only and may not be redistributed, modified, or resold.
termsAndConditions.reportsRestrictions: Reports may include usage restrictions or expiration terms as defined by the expert contributor.
termsAndConditions.knoldgCurates: Knoldg curates reports from expert contributors and develops its own proprietary insights.
termsAndConditions.expertEnsure: Expert contributors must ensure their content is accurate, non-misleading, and compliant with applicable laws and regulations.
termsAndConditions.Usersaccurate: Users must provide accurate and complete information upon registration.
termsAndConditions.Usersresponsible: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials.
termsAndConditions.Knoldgnotified: Knoldg must be notified immediately of any unauthorized account activity.
termsAndConditions.Acceptedpayment: Accepted payment methods include credit cards, PayPal, bank transfers, and region-specific options.
termsAndConditions.RefundsNotAllowed: Refunds are not allowed once content has been accessed, except in cases of technical errors (e.g., duplicate charges, corrupt downloads).
termsAndConditions.SubscriptionRenew: Subscription plans will auto-renew unless canceled by the user.
termsAndConditions.KnoldgRight: Knoldg reserves the right to modify, discontinue, or update features without prior notice.
termsAndConditions.Usersnotified: Users will be notified of any significant changes that impact access or pricing.
termsAndConditions.ServicesMaterials: Services and materials are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
termsAndConditions.Knoldgliable: Knoldg is not liable for business decisions made based on purchased insights.
termsAndConditions.Liabilitycapped: Liability is capped at the amount paid by the user for the disputed service.
termsAndConditions.ForEU: For EU users: Governed by GDPR and EU consumer laws.
termsAndConditions.ForUS: For U.S. users: Governed by CCPA and applicable state laws.
termsAndConditions.ForJordan: For Jordan & GCC: Governed by local data protection and e-commerce laws.
termsAndConditions.Jordanianlaw: Jordanian law applies to all disputes. Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration or courts in Knoldg's registered jurisdiction.

privacyPage.Knoldgcollects: Knoldg collects personal data to enhance user experience, including:
privacyPage.WeProcess: We process personal data based on:
privacyPage.LegitimateInterests: Legitimate interests (e.g., improving our platform and fraud prevention)
privacyPage.PersonalData: Personal data is not sold to third parties.
privacyPage.DataShared: Data may be shared with service providers (e.g., payment processors, fraud prevention services) to facilitate platform operations.
privacyPage.InformationDisclosed: Information may be disclosed if legally required (e.g., government compliance, legal disputes).
privacyPage.KnoldgCookies: Knoldg uses cookies and tracking technologies to enhance user experience and improve services.
privacyPage.UsersCookie: Users can adjust cookie preferences via their browser settings.
privacyPage.AccessCorrect: Access, correct, or delete personal data
privacyPage.Knoldgemploys: Knoldg employs industry-standard encryption and access controls to protect user data.
privacyPage.StrictSecurity: We follow strict security measures to prevent unauthorized access and breaches.
privacyPage.PersonalData2: Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for service delivery and legal compliance.

dataLicenseAgreement.scopeLine1: Contributors grant Knoldg a non-exclusive, worldwide license to:
dataLicenseAgreement.paymentsLine1: Contributors earn a royalty per sale from each transaction.
dataLicenseAgreement.paymentsLine2: Knoldg will issue payouts within X days after each transaction.
dataLicenseAgreement.paymentsLine3: Taxes are the responsibility of the contributor.
dataLicenseAgreement.ipLine1: Contributors must own or have rights to any content they upload.
dataLicenseAgreement.ipLine2: Knoldg reserves the right to remove any content that infringes IP laws.
dataLicenseAgreement.liabilityLine1: Experts must ensure content accuracy and comply with all applicable laws.
dataLicenseAgreement.liabilityLine2: Knoldg is not liable for damages resulting from reliance on purchased insights.
dataLicenseAgreement.liabilityLine3: Experts agree to indemnify Knoldg against legal claims arising from misleading or false content.
dataLicenseAgreement.terminationLine1: Contributors may request content removal, but existing sales and licenses remain valid.
dataLicenseAgreement.terminationLine2: Knoldg may terminate agreements with contributors who violate policies.

cookiesPolicy.introLine1: This Cookies Policy explains how Knoldg uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit the platform.
cookiesPolicy.consentLine1: Upon your first visit to the platform, we will display a cookie consent banner asking for your permission to use certain categories of cookies.
cookiesPolicy.consentLine2: You may change or withdraw your consent at any time through your browser or privacy settings.
cookiesPolicy.authLine1: Our platform primarily uses localStorage for authentication instead of cookies.
cookiesPolicy.authLine2: This approach simplifies the authentication flow and resolves issues with users being unexpectedly logged out after login.
cookiesPolicy.typeEssential: Essential Cookies: Required for basic functionality of the platform.
cookiesPolicy.typeAnalytics: Analytical/Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our platform.
cookiesPolicy.typeFunctionality: Functionality Cookies: Allow the platform to remember choices you make.
cookiesPolicy.typeTargeting: Targeting Cookies: Record your visit to our platform, pages visited, and links followed.
cookiesPolicy.typeConsent: Consent Management Cookies: Store your cookie preferences and consent selections.
cookiesPolicy.manageLine1: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.manageLine2: However, disabling some cookies may affect the functionality of certain parts of the platform.

contactUsPage.contactUsTitle: Message us now — We'd be happy to help!
contactUsPage.contactUsSuccessMessage: Your message has been sent successfully
contactUsPage.contactUsSuccessSubtext: We will get back to you as soon as possible
